resources.string:
Make sure you use one of the following ways:

1. Amazmod on your phone/watch and your stock calendar has events

2. You have placed locally an iCalendar feed (create/write the URL in a file named pacecalendar.txt) or ICS file (named pacecalendar.ics) at:
/sdcard/Android/data/com.dinodevs.pacecalendarwidget/files/

Touch the refresh button to load them
